content.question: Mannerist works, such as Madonna with the Long Neck, tended to employ which of the following elements?

choices.label: Depictions based on the influence of newly discovered Asian and African art
Realistic depictions of individuals modeled on Roman and Greek classics
Abstract depictions meant to satirize the subject of the artwork
Distorted and dramatic depictions employed to heighten emotion

content.answer: Distorted and dramatic depictions employed to heighten emotion

topic.text: 2.7: Art of the 16th Century: Mannerism and Baroque Art

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
